quote: A day without laughter is a day wasted.
name: Charlie Chaplin

quote: Start every day off with a smile and get it over with.
name: W. C. Fields

quote: Comedy is simply a funny way of being serious.
name: Peter Ustinov

quote: Humor is mankind's greatest blessing.
name: Mark Twain

quote: There is a thin line that separates laughter and pain, comedy and tragedy, humor and hurt.
name: Erma Bombeck

quote: Like a welcome summer rain, humor may suddenly cleanse and cool the earth, the air and you.
name: Langston Hughes

quote: Everywhere is within walking distance if you have the time.
name: Steven Wright

quote: Laughter is an instant vacation.
name: Milton Berle

quote: Everything is funny, as long as it's happening to somebody else.
name: Will Rogers

quote: From there to here, and here to there, funny things are everywhere.
name: Dr. Seuss

quote: The most wasted of all days is one without laughter.
name: e. e. cummings

quote: If I had no sense of humor, I would long ago have committed suicide.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Celebrate your successes. Find some humor in your failures.
name: Sam Walton

quote: Kindness and a generous spirit go a long way. And a sense of humor. It's like medicine - very healing.
name: Max Irons

quote: A person without a sense of humor is like a wagon without springs. It's jolted by every pebble on the road.
name: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: My view of life is colored by humor and looking at the best in any situation.
name: Michael J. Fox

quote: A little perspective, like a little humor, goes a long way.
name: Allen Klein

quote: A sense of humor is a major defense against minor troubles.
name: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: My life is part humor, part roses, part thorns.
name: Bret Michaels

quote: Good late-night humor can work at any time of the day.
name: Rich Eisen

quote: Laughter is the closest distance between two people.
name: Victor Borge

quote: Humor is an antidote to all ills.
name: Patch Adams

quote: The secret to humor is surprise.
name: Aristotle

quote: Humor is everywhere in that there's irony in just about anything a human does.
name: Bill Nye

quote: The problem with having a sense of humor is often that people you use it on aren't in a very good mood.
name: Lou Holtz

quote: Humor is by far the most significant activity of the human brain.
name: Edward de Bono

quote: Humor is emotional chaos remembered in tranquility.
name: James Thurber

quote: It's always funny until someone gets hurt. Then it's just hilarious.
name: Bill Hicks

quote: What a strange world this would be if we all had the same sense of humor.
name: Bernard Williams

quote: When a chick has a sense of humor, there's nothing more attractive.
name: Dylan O'Brien

quote: The secret source of humor is not joy but sorrow; there is no humor in Heaven.
name: Mark Twain

quote: Keeping an active mind has been vital to my survival, as has been maintaining a sense of humor.
name: Stephen Hawking

quote: Everybody's got a different sense of humor. It's just different styles.
name: Colin Quinn

quote: I don't think it's possible to have a sense of tragedy without having a sense of humor.
name: Christopher Hitchens

quote: Great men are rarely isolated mountain peaks; they are the summits of ranges.
name: Thomas Wentworth Higginson

quote: Cynicism is humor in ill health.
name: H. G. Wells

quote: I think the scariest person in the world is the person with no sense of humor.
name: Michael J. Fox

quote: The more I live, the more I think that humor is the saving sense.
name: Jacob Riis

quote: Transparency, honesty, kindness, good stewardship, even humor, work in businesses at all times.
name: John Gerzema

quote: I have never believed much in luck, and my sense of humor has tended to walk on the dark side.
name: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: When humor goes, there goes civilization.
name: Erma Bombeck

quote: I love people who have a good sense of humor, tell a good story, tell a good joke.
name: Jason Statham

quote: Wit - the salt with which the American humorist spoils his intellectual cookery by leaving it out.
name: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Keep your sense of humor, my friend; if you don't have a sense of humor it just isn't funny anymore.
name: Wavy Gravy

quote: People of humor are always in some degree people of genius.
name: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: I think the next best thing to solving a problem is finding some humor in it.
name: Frank A. Clark

quote: It's good to be able to laugh at yourself and the problems you face in life. Sense of humor can save you.
name: Margaret Cho

quote: You know, I'm Australian, and we have got the worst sense of humor. We are cruel to each other.
name: Steve Irwin

quote: Gags die, humor doesn't.
name: Jack Benny

quote: I do talk about celebrity relationships like Kim Kardashian's. I like to find the humor in love.
name: Loni Love

quote: I don't understand how somebody wouldn't have a sense of humor about themselves.
name: John Malkovich

quote: I think a sense of humor will help get a girl out of a dark place.
name: Twyla Tharp

quote: That is the saving grace of humor, if you fail no one is laughing at you.
name: A. Whitney Brown

quote: I think anyone who behaves boorishly but without a good sense of humor is not as fun to watch.
name: Gaby Hoffmann

quote: I have always found humor in places where humor wasn't necessarily intended.
name: Silas Weir Mitchell

quote: Humor is reason gone mad.
name: Groucho Marx

quote: I'm not funny. What I am is brave.
name: Lucille Ball

quote: A sense of humor is good for you. Have you ever heard of a laughing hyena with heart burn?
name: Bob Hope

quote: The first ingredient in conversation is truth, the next good sense, the third good humor, and the fourth wit.
name: William Temple

quote: Humor comes from self-confidence.
name: Rita Mae Brown

quote: I am often the brunt of my own humor.
name: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: My mother was very funny. My dad had a great sense of humor. My grandmother, too.
name: Carol Burnett

quote: Any man who has had the job I've had and didn't have a sense of humor wouldn't still be here.
name: Harry S Truman

quote: Humor is the most engaging cowardice.
name: Robert Frost

quote: Hateful words stand no chance against self-worth and a little of humor.
name: Iskra Lawrence

quote: Congratulations, you have a sense of humor. And to those who didn't: Go stick your head in the mud.
name: Jesse Ventura

quote: Get well cards have become so humorous that if you don't get sick you're missing half the fun.
name: Flip Wilson

quote: I want someone who can keep me on my toes, has a good sense of humor and a good heart.
name: Carmen Electra

quote: I wasn't shy, but I was really hyper. Nobody got my sense of humor. I was a black skater kid.
name: Tyler, The Creator

quote: Humor brings insight and tolerance. Irony brings a deeper and less friendly understanding.
name: Agnes Repplier

quote: Humor is the ability to see three sides to one coin.
name: Ned Rorem

quote: I think I have always had a little humor.
name: Marilyn Monroe

quote: A sense of humor is great - it goes a long, long way in a marriage.
name: Chris Rock

quote: Humor is laughing at what you haven't got when you ought to have it.
name: Langston Hughes

quote: The schizophrenic has no sense of humor. His world is a constantly daunting, unfriendly place.
name: Bob Newhart

quote: Laughter, and the broader category of humor, are key elements in helping us go on with our life after a loss.
name: Allen Klein

quote: I love dry British humor. I love to sketch in my off time. I love tequila.
name: Maren Morris

quote: Wit is the lowest form of humor.
name: Alexander Pope

quote: Analyzing humor is like dissecting a frog. Few people are interested and the frog dies of it.
name: E. B. White

quote: I could not tread these perilous paths in safety, if I did not keep a saving sense of humor.
name: Horatio Nelson

quote: In everyday life, I use positive thoughts, sense of humor, Taekwondo, running, and yoga to make me stronger.
name: Pom Klementieff

quote: Anybody with a sense of humor is going to put on my album and laugh from beginning to end.
name: Eminem

quote: The best way to make your audience laugh is to start laughing yourself.
name: Oliver Goldsmith

quote: Nothing like a little judicious levity.
name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: It's a funny old world.
name: Margaret Thatcher

quote: Among my friends, I'm not a little Boy Scout, and they love my humor, thank God.
name: Don Rickles

quote: It's hard to force creativity and humor.
name: Al Yankovic

quote: Humor is the truth; wit is an exaggeration of the truth.
name: Stan Laurel

quote: The thing that I fear discriminating against is humor and truth.
name: Charles Bukowski

quote: One of the things that binds us as a family is a shared sense of humor.
name: Ralph Fiennes

quote: Sometimes I make myself laugh, but that's because I appreciate my sense of humor.
name: Regina Hall

quote: My daughter doesn't even get my humor. She's like, 'Um, no. I don't get it, Dad. Mmm, no, not that one, Dad.'
name: Kevin Hart

quote: My sense of humor is a turkey, and I pull it out of the oven and baste it in reality.
name: Tracy Morgan

quote: Laughter is involuntary. If it's funny you laugh.
name: Tom Lehrer

quote: When people are in the midst of really heavy stuff and still have a sense of humor, I admire that.
name: Ted Danson

quote: We do not take humor seriously enough.
name: Konrad Lorenz

quote: Total absence of humor renders life impossible.
name: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette

quote: Next to power without honor, the most dangerous thing in the world is power without humor.
name: Eric Sevareid

quote: To me, in life, if you have a sense of humor about it, that's how you deal with anything.
name: Ralph Macchio

quote: Self-deprecating humor and brutal honesty is a really freeing thing.
name: Margo Price

quote: Think about scary movies: There's a fine line between horror and humor.
name: Roy Blount, Jr.

quote: Since the very beginning, Emeril's had a sense of humor about me calling him names and poking fun at him.
name: Anthony Bourdain

quote: I've met a lot of people who've lost their jobs and they still have a sense of humor.
name: Louis C. K.

quote: Things are more complex today, and I think humor has changed a a great deal. People are more sensitive today.
name: Lewis Grizzard

quote: If you are a small company taking on a big company, you need to have a sense of humor.
name: Richard Branson

quote: Humor and seriousness are not in opposition to each other.
name: Al Franken

quote: Humor is one of the best ingredients of survival.
name: Aung San Suu Kyi

quote: Humor has justly been regarded as the finest perfection of poetic genius.
name: Thomas Carlyle

quote: I think being funny is not anyone's first choice.
name: Woody Allen

quote: Different taste in jokes is a great strain on the affections.
name: George Eliot

quote: I have a fine sense of the ridiculous, but no sense of humor.
name: Edward Albee

quote: In rough times, pathfinders rely on work, friends, humor and prayer. They develop a support network.
name: Gail Sheehy

quote: Humor is the first of the gifts to perish in a foreign tongue.
name: Virginia Woolf

quote: Nobody enjoys the 'little show about nothing' humor more than me, but that is never the way I look at it.
name: Jerry Seinfeld

quote: Professional comedians, surprisingly, have a lack of humor. They're insensitive to the insanity of our times.
name: Mort Sahl

quote: Men live by intervals of reason under the sovereignty of humor and passion.
name: Thomas Browne

quote: I hang out with the 'nerdy' people - they have a different sense of humor than most kids.
name: Liam Aiken

quote: I think the humor of double puns is incredible.
name: Richard Lederer

quote: I don't feel any need to play the role of the clown. In my private life I take a break from humor.
name: Gad Elmaleh

quote: A good sense of humor will get you everywhere.
name: Josh Bowman

quote: People who have any kind of illness use humor as a type of coping.
name: Edward Zwick

quote: You're not going to see my sense of humor on the football field. That's not a place for me to joke around.
name: Tom Brady

quote: Insult is powerful. Insult begets both rage and humor and often at the same time.
name: Suzanne Fields

quote: Confidence and a good sense of humor can usually win a chick over.
name: Danny McBride

quote: Sense of humor is important in life, not just in clothing. How boring to live a life in beige.
name: Jean Pigozzi

quote: This is a feminist bookstore. There is no humor section.
name: John Callahan

quote: Good humor is one of the best articles of dress one can wear in society.
name: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: I've got a great sense of humor.
name: Anthony Hopkins

quote: Impropriety is the soul of wit.
name: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: You are not angry with people when you laugh at them. Humor teaches tolerance.
name: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: I can imagine no more comfortable frame of mind for the conduct of life than a humorous resignation.
name: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: We are, in the comics, the last frontier of good, wholesome family humor and entertainment.
name: Bil Keane

quote: My humor had changed from foolishness to making sense.
name: Bernie Mac

quote: You can't study comedy; it's within you. It's a personality. My humor is an attitude.
name: Don Rickles

quote: And I loved Fats Waller. I love his instrumental abilities, his vocal abilities and his sense of humor.
name: Paul McCartney

quote: In conversation, humor is worth more than wit and easiness more than knowledge.
name: George Herbert

quote: I have a very dark sense of humor. I swear. I have a very playful relationship with Jesus.
name: Anne Lamott

quote: A lot of people can find something to laugh at in my humor, I guess.
name: Ron White

quote: If you get a diagnosis, get on a therapy, keep a good attitude and keep your sense of humor.
name: Teri Garr

quote: Good humor is the health of the soul, sadness is its poison.
name: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield

quote: Denzel Washington has a great sense of humor. He did all those 'Nutty Professor' movies.
name: Seth MacFarlane

quote: A laugh is a surprise. And all humor is physical. I was always athletic, so that came naturally to me.
name: Chevy Chase

quote: From an early age onward, it was said that 'Ingmar has no sense of humor.'
name: Ingmar Bergman

quote: Anyone who knows me, and most of my fans, know that I have a sense of humor.
name: Glenn Danzig

quote: I think that sense of humor is important in marriage. A sense of humor gets people through marriage.
name: Kyle Chandler

quote: Sometimes it takes ten seconds to see some humor in your dilemmas, sometimes ten years.
name: Allen Klein

quote: You may not be able to change a situation, but with humor you can change your attitude about it.
name: Allen Klein

quote: Humor starts like a wildfire, but then continues on, smoldering, smoldering for years.
name: Robert Orben

quote: That's what kept us going - a sense of absurdity, rather than humor.
name: Frank McCourt

quote: I make jokes because humor is the greatest healing factor that there is.
name: Dick Dale

quote: Well, darkness with humor... I'm not an extremely suicidal or sad person.
name: Peter Steele

quote: As far as humor goes, I've always been a very insecure person and I've always wanted to be liked.
name: Peter Steele

quote: Comedy has to be based on truth. You take the truth and you put a little curlicue at the end.
name: Sid Caesar

quote: I was born with a mother who loved me unconditionally and with a sense of humor.
name: Anthony Ray Hinton

quote: Me and Matt love to argue, but in general our sense of humor is pretty much alike.
name: Trey Parker

quote: I didn't think that anything is beyond humor - not profane humor, but a good, honest approach to humor.
name: Mort Sahl

quote: Humor is always based on a modicum of truth. Have you ever heard a joke about a father-in-law?
name: Dick Clark

quote: Men love it. They have a sense of humor, whereas a lot of women are threatened or just don't get it.
name: Lara Flynn Boyle

quote: Good humor isn't a trait of character, it is an art which requires practice.
name: David Seabury

quote: I don't have a caustic sense of humor. What I find funny, that humor comes from a much gentler place.
name: Vera Farmiga

quote: I have five boys in the family, and it's constant competition, sport, humor, and practical jokes.
name: Mitt Romney

quote: In my experience, if people don't have a sense of humor, they are usually not very good scientists, either.
name: Andre Geim

quote: The Good Humor man can only be pushed so far.
name: Nancy Cartwright

quote: I appreciate humor so much, but I'm actually not a funny girl.
name: Emmanuelle Chriqui

quote: I hate to say it but I hate black humor. I feel like a Klan member saying it, but it's just not funny.
name: Issa Rae

quote: I am a great believer that what makes our show different is the humor.
name: Treat Williams

quote: Humor without sadness underneath it feels cheap and aggressive.
name: John Cameron Mitchell

quote: I'm interested in people's darkness - and humor in the darkness.
name: Tanya Saracho

quote: Humor was not important only for me, humor was important for this nation for centuries, to survive, you know.
name: Milos Forman

quote: We take the shortest route to the puck and arrive in ill humor.
name: Bobby Clarke

quote: If I can't see the humor in it, how am I going to be funny?
name: Casey Affleck

quote: There's a tremendous amount of humor... in very unexpected places.
name: Holly Hunter

quote: We don't appreciate the value of humor sometimes.
name: Janet Evanovich

quote: My humor is my creativity, and my skepticism is a gift.
name: Josh Tillman

quote: I don't have a disregard for my reader in humor pieces.
name: Ian Frazier

quote: Guys usually like my sense of humor, and I am pretty down to earth. And I'm a driven person.
name: Kreayshawn

quote: Humor is a very important thing. It is a natural predilection. It is an emotional release.
name: Ray Stevenson

quote: I believe that economists put decimal points in their forecasts to show they have a sense of humor.
name: William Gilmore Simms

quote: Hope for the best, survive the worst, find humor wherever you can.
name: Claire Scovell LaZebnik

quote: Humor is a social lubricant that helps us get over some of the bad spots.
name: Steve Allen

quote: I think humor is important for all of us, and a great comedian is a great treasure.
name: Leila Josefowicz

quote: I have a good sense of humor. I think everything we do should have whimsy in it.
name: Judith Leiber

quote: Life is tragic comedy, in a way. There is humor.
name: Tcheky Karyo

quote: Humor is an affirmation of dignity, a declaration of man's superiority to all that befalls him.
name: Romain Gary

quote: No mind is thoroughly well organized that is deficient in a sense of humor.
name: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: I like bawdy humor. I love bawdy humor, but not dirty humor.
name: Betty White

quote: Men are happy to be laughed at for their humor, but not for their folly.
name: Jonathan Swift

quote: I think that humor has become a principle means of communication among Americans about politics.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: It doesn't take many people to have a bad sense of humor to get in trouble at a corporation.
name: Scott Adams

quote: The duty of comedy is to correct men by amusing them.
name: Moliere

quote: Poop humor is fun. If you do the toilet scenes well and commit to them, they can be really, really powerful.
name: Sandra Bullock

quote: I suppose I miss the British cynicism and the humor.
name: Rod Stewart

quote: Love, as wonderful and horrible as it is, has at its center a kind of pitiful humor.
name: Tim O'Brien

quote: Humor does not rescue us from unhappiness, but enables us to move back from it a little.
name: Mason Cooley

quote: I quite like dark humor.
name: Marina and the Diamonds

quote: Humor is just another defense against the universe.
name: Mel Brooks

quote: A lot of people into Tool, for some reason, are not interested in humor.
name: Maynard James Keenan

quote: If you stop and think about it, nearly all great humor is at the expense of someone or something.
name: Alan King

quote: I'm strange! I have a weird sense of humor! I look crazy!
name: Trixie Mattel

quote: Political correctness? In my humor, I never talk about politics. I was never much into all that.
name: Don Rickles

quote: Half the battle is that people have to like you before you say one joke, one bit of humor.
name: Don Rickles

quote: The total absence of humor from the Bible is one of the most singular things in all literature.
name: Alfred North Whitehead

quote: If you look at terrorists, they really have no sense of humor.
name: Al Franken

quote: Bob Dole used to be really funny. Barney Frank can be kind of funny. Bob Kerrey has a good sense of humor.
name: Al Franken

quote: There's plenty of room for humor in politics, God knows, but it's a serious business.
name: Al Franken

quote: A pun is the lowest form of humor, unless you thought of it yourself.
name: Doug Larson

quote: I'm not a particularly dark individual. I have my moments, it's true, but I do have a sense of humor.
name: Alan Moore

quote: Sometimes the only way to deal with horrific things in life is through a dark sense of humor.
name: Margaret Cho

quote: Humor is my default mode.
name: John Updike

quote: Humor is so important to the American scene throughout history.
name: Bob Newhart

quote: What you see on stage is pretty much the way I am... a dry sense of humor.
name: Bob Newhart

quote: Humor's a weapon if you want to make it one.
name: Bob Newhart

quote: Stand-up comics reflect less of a visual humor and more of a commentary.
name: Shel Silverstein

quote: Comedy, we may say, is society protecting itself - with a smile.
name: J. B. Priestley

quote: I want to show the world my humor.
name: Tracy Morgan

quote: If I had to describe my sense of humor, I would say it's contemporary wit, you know what I'm saying?
name: Tracy Morgan

quote: Some people say my humor focuses too much on stereotypes. It doesn't. It focuses on facts.
name: Sarah Silverman

quote: I need a man with a good sense of humor and a kind heart.
name: Joanna Krupa

quote: I love British humor. It's just so - surreal.
name: Beck

quote: You have to have a sense of humor about life to get through it.
name: Kesha

quote: I'm just very amused by five-year-old humor.
name: Kesha

quote: Humor is to get us over terrible things.
name: Ricky Gervais

quote: Sites like Funny or Die and College Humor are great, but I'd say it's appealing to 80% men and 20% women.
name: Zooey Deschanel

quote: Humor is a part of spirituality.
name: Zooey Deschanel

quote: If the blood humor is too strong and robust, calm it with balance and harmony.
name: Xun Kuang

quote: All I know about humor is that I don't know anything about it.
name: Fred Allen

quote: I don't think I would describe my sense of humor. Doesn't sound like the kind of thing I'd do.
name: Tommy Lee Jones

quote: I do not have a sense of humor of any recognizable sort.
name: Tommy Lee Jones

quote: People with no humor, they're outta my life.
name: Patti LaBelle

quote: Humor is the affectionate communication of insight.
name: Leo Rosten

quote: There's always a source for humor.
name: Calvin Trillin

quote: Humor that is edgy is never squeaky clean.
name: Jeff Ross

quote: I love poking fun at myself. I have a rather mean sense of humor.
name: Alton Brown

quote: There's humor in everything. There's gotta be humor in everything.
name: Amy Sedaris

quote: Humor is very healing.
name: Bonnie Hunt

quote: With Ricky Gervais, it's all shades of wrong, it's my kind of humor.
name: Emily Blunt

quote: I realized women and humor were linked very closely.
name: Craig Ferguson

quote: I think it's critical, a sense of humor. It did help me - it does help me, continuously.
name: Teri Garr

quote: God has a most wicked sense of humor.
name: Maureen O'Hara

quote: I got my sense of humor from my grandmother. You know, my grandmother was very funny.
name: Paul Mooney

quote: What we're doing is fun - if you have any sense of humor at all!
name: Calvin Klein

quote: Both of my kids have my sense of humor - they're definitely entertaining.
name: Jodie Sweetin

quote: Women respond to comfort and a sense of humor. I was always able to make them laugh, so that helps a lot.
name: Peter Dinklage

quote: Without a sense of humor, I would have been gone a long time ago.
name: Patty Duke

quote: I come from a much freer kind of performance thing, where I rely on my own improv and my own sense of humor.
name: Chevy Chase

quote: There seems to be no lengths to which humorless people will not go to analyze humor. It seems to worry them.
name: Robert Benchley

quote: It's weird doing red carpets; it's uncomfortable. But you can have a sense of humor about it.
name: Kirsten Dunst

quote: Rock Hudson wasn't my type. He's a great guy and had a great sense of humor.
name: Tab Hunter

quote: It's easier to sit there and say you don't like feminists because they don't have a sense of humor.
name: Joan Jett

quote: Americans are pragmatic, relatively uncomplicated, hearty and given to broad humor.
name: Herb Caen

quote: The comic is the perception of the opposite; humor is the feeling of it.
name: Umberto Eco

quote: Humor can alter any situation and help us cope at the very instant we are laughing.
name: Allen Klein

quote: Humor does not diminish the pain - it makes the space around it get bigger.
name: Allen Klein

quote: Advertisers also know that humor can help bond us to their product.
name: Allen Klein

quote: Whether planned or not, humor takes our mind off of our troubles.
name: Allen Klein

quote: Any attempts at humor immediately after September 11th were deemed tasteless.
name: Allen Klein

quote: Throughout history, great leaders have known the power of humor.
name: Allen Klein

quote: Humor can be one of our best survival tools.
name: Allen Klein

quote: When we can find some humor in our upsets, they no longer seem as large or as important as they once did.
name: Allen Klein

quote: Humor expands our limited picture frame and gets us to see more than just our problem.
name: Allen Klein

quote: I don't think that because you die and move on to somewhere else that you lose your sense of humor.
name: Peter Jackson

quote: President Ford used humor a great deal.
name: Robert Orben

quote: My father could be very witty, even if the humor was always on the darker side of irony.
name: Maurice Sendak

quote: I think there's something about the Irish experience - that we had to have a sense of humor or die.
name: Frank McCourt

quote: Sometimes I find I'm wearing a divided, split brain in terms of drama and humor.
name: Ridley Scott

quote: We're all funny. Humor unites us.
name: Luis Alberto Urrea

quote: This I conceive to be the chemical function of humor: to change the character of our thought.
name: Lin Yutang

quote: You see, that's another thing that my parents gave me: an enormously great sense of humor.
name: Liza Minnelli

quote: There is very little room for humor and personality in hip-hop.
name: Andy Mineo

quote: Things can be funny only when we are in fun. When we're 'dead earnest,' humor is the only thing that is dead.
name: Flip Wilson

quote: I think in life, the sense of humor and comedy always exists.
name: Mike Epps

quote: Believe it or not, there's a lot of humor in 'Mad Men.' Especially in the dark moments.
name: Matthew Weiner

quote: I'm not an expert on the Malaysian sense of humor.
name: Ben Stiller

quote: I actually have a pretty good sense of humor.
name: Stone Cold Steve Austin

quote: Puns are a form of humor with words.
name: Guillermo Cabrera Infante

quote: If you're that hypersensitive about color and don't have a sense of humor, don't marry out of your race.
name: Laura Schlessinger

quote: Bad humor is an evasion of reality; good humor is an acceptance of it.
name: Malcolm Muggeridge

quote: Leonard Cohen has a way with words and with humor that remind me to lighten up, which I appreciate very much.
name: Damien Rice

quote: The love of truth lies at the root of much humor.
name: Robertson Davies

quote: Nothing in man is more serious than his sense of humor; it is the sign that he wants all the truth.
name: Mark Van Doren

quote: I just am a snob when it comes to humor.
name: Courteney Cox

quote: Humor can be an incredible lacerating and effective weapon. And that is the way I use it.
name: Carl Hiaasen

quote: Humor can be an incredible, lacerating and effective weapon.
name: Carl Hiaasen

quote: Wit is an explosion of the compound spirit.
name: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

quote: The people in New York - their humor is on a level that goes, uh, very deep, you know?
name: Elaine Stritch

quote: Mixing humor and politics is something that works.
name: Bryan Cranston

quote: My sense of humor lies a little closer to the middle.
name: Jason Bateman

quote: There's such a rich history in 'SNL' of political humor, and I think audience members expect that from us.
name: Sasheer Zamata

quote: One can never speak enough of the virtues, the dangers, the power of shared laughter.
name: Francoise Sagan

quote: I tend to deal with most issues with humor... always have and always will.
name: Gordon Gee

quote: I think that sense of humor is important in marriage. A sense of humor gets people through marriage.
name: Connie Britton

quote: Any band that doesn't have a sense of humor has a little bit of a problem.
name: Jens Lekman

quote: Paul Rudd has a very specific brand of humor.
name: Michael Pena

quote: I like guys with a sense of humor who smile a lot and are kind.
name: Nikki Glaser

quote: As I get older, my sense of humor is my biggest asset.
name: David Alan Grier

quote: Humor distorts nothing, and only false gods are laughed off their earthly pedestals.
name: Agnes Repplier

quote: Married people should not be quick to hear what is said by either when in ill humor.
name: Samuel Richardson

quote: I'm a big fan of independent girls who are strong-willed, vocal in their opinions, and have a sense of humor.
name: David Lambert

quote: Humor works, and it's the best way to get attention without spending a lot of money.
name: Jerry Della Femina

quote: I think the main thing about comedy and humor is that it's impossible and always was impossible to define.
name: Mike Nichols

quote: I stay far away from political humor.
name: Anjelah Johnson

quote: People who know me know I have a sense of humor that can really push the envelope.
name: Carmen Electra

quote: We have always had gross humor. But we try for funny, not gross.
name: Shawn Wayans

quote: My fam is just a regular family. But all of them have great senses of humor.
name: Dane Cook

quote: You can't be funny if you don't have good material.
name: Matt LeBlanc

quote: Humor is the instinct for taking pain playfully.
name: Max Eastman

quote: It is the ability to take a joke, not make one, that proves you have a sense of humor.
name: Max Eastman

quote: I defuse everything I can with it. Humor is such a great shield.
name: Brad Paisley

quote: I think that humor is part of what saves us from despair.
name: John Perry Barlow

quote: A lot of people say, 'Hey, God doesn't have a sense of humor.' Yes, He does. God has a great sense of humor.
name: Si Robertson

quote: A humorist is a person who feels bad, but who feels good about it.
name: Don Herold

quote: I think God gave us senses of humor, and we should use them.
name: Vera Farmiga

quote: I think God has a tremendous sense of humor.
name: Rainn Wilson

quote: I'm a humor writer, so I don't always present myself in the best light.
name: Jen Lancaster

quote: Humor's an excellent way to make a point more palatable and/or relatable.
name: Jen Lancaster

quote: Humor is the secret into the audience's other ranges of emotions.
name: Kevin Feige

quote: I've used my sense of humor as a coping tool. It's gotten me through a lot of challenging times.
name: Adam Rippon

quote: I'm not for gratuitous nudity, but if there's humor, I don't have a problem.
name: Rebecca Romijn

quote: I'm able to see humor in a lot of things.
name: Juliana Hatfield

quote: A sense of humor is the ability to understand a joke - and that the joke is oneself.
name: Clifton Fadiman

quote: Philip Larkin has a tough honesty and sense of humor that I find irresistible, as a contemporary poet.
name: Robert Morgan

quote: Humor is always more interesting when it comes from someone who's had more than, like, five experiences.
name: Daniel Mallory Ortberg

quote: There is no defense against adverse fortune which is so effectual as an habitual sense of humor.
name: Thomas Wentworth Higginson

quote: I wish there were more humor in my work than I see in it.
name: Jasper Johns

quote: All Shondaland shows have a level of intelligence, a level of humor, a level of pathos and human connection.
name: Jason Winston George

quote: Humor is healing.
name: Brad Garrett

quote: Even as a kid I was never the generator of humor, but I always knew who was funny, who to hang out with.
name: Andrew Stanton

quote: The key to humor is often self-loathing or sarcasm. In a sense, that's how self-loathing is made palatable.
name: James Gray

quote: I think bands, when they're on the road, they keep their sanity by developing an internal sense of humor.
name: Ric Ocasek

quote: My fans have great senses of humor and eat too much chocolate.
name: Christopher Moore

quote: I have the humor of a 9-year-old boy, and sometimes I've had laughing fits on-air.
name: Megyn Kelly

quote: Humor can inform and break down stigma, which is a huge issue in the military.
name: Garry Trudeau

quote: Bringing humor and bringing happiness and joy to an audience is a wonderful opportunity in life, believe me.
name: Angela Lansbury

quote: My type of humor is me not caring whether people know what I'm talking about or not.
name: John Hodgman

quote: The darker the film, the more vital everyone's sense of humor is on set.
name: Eric Bana

quote: You can find humor in most things, and even terrible things.
name: Thundercat

quote: A joke's a very serious thing.
name: Charles Churchill

quote: And for my family, comedically, that was the key to a lot of the humor.
name: Damon Wayans

quote: Bands from Akron have a sense of humor and don't tend to take themselves too seriously.
name: Dan Auerbach

quote: I feel like I've always had a sordid sense of humor, and it's only gotten more twisted as I've gotten older.
name: Tituss Burgess

quote: I like good humor.
name: John J. McLaughlin

quote: I was certainly not a class clown; I confused and angered a lot of people with my sense of humor.
name: Katherine Ryan

quote: Humor, humility, and, of course, honesty, all are qualities that work in public and cultural diplomacy.
name: Cynthia P. Schneider

quote: I can't not put humor in a book.
name: Albert Brooks

quote: My humor is traced with dark - I've got dark patches all over the place.
name: Albert Brooks

quote: Humor comes from the surprise release of some buried tension.
name: Lorrie Moore

quote: I'm not really big on slapstick humor. I like gentle humor.
name: Anjelica Huston

quote: It never seems to occur to some people, that, like beauty, a sense of humor may sometimes be fatal.
name: Edgar Rice Burroughs

quote: 'Scorpion' has so much humor and so much heart and a great deal of action.
name: Nina Tassler

quote: I have a dark sense of humor.
name: Olivia Munn

quote: G.I. humor is similar to cop humor.
name: Nelson DeMille

quote: Academics tend to have wonderfully infantile senses of humor.
name: John Lithgow

quote: You've got to have a sense of humor to keep your sanity.
name: Lance Bass

quote: Our humor turns our anger into a fine art.
name: Mary Kay Blakely

quote: In the 'Hurt Locker' there's a lot of me in there, a sense of humor, a man of few words and a lot of action.
name: Jeremy Renner

quote: I have a very dark sense of humor.
name: Andy Dick

quote: I don't think my sense of humor has changed at all; I was born with this, for better or for worse.
name: Ivan Reitman

quote: I find life a mix of humor and pathos, and all my books reflect that to one degree or another.
name: Elizabeth Berg

quote: Sometimes in the most tragic situation, something just profoundly funny happens.
name: David Hyde Pierce

quote: Some people don't have a sense of humor.
name: Daniel Lyons

quote: Robert Walker as Bruno was excellent. He had elegance and humor, and the proper fondness for his mother.
name: Patricia Highsmith

quote: Jazz can be so serious, no sense of humor.
name: Chad Smith

quote: I'm a sarcastic person, and people don't get my humor sometimes.
name: Sarah Hyland

quote: You don't necessarily equate me with humor!
name: Sean Bean

quote: I really just love dumb humor. I watch a lot of SNL.
name: Taylor Louderman

quote: I think, in our darkest moments, you have to find the humor, and you have to find the lightness.
name: Corey Hawkins

quote: I've got a sense of humor. I'm a funny guy.
name: Daryl Hall

quote: I always gravitate toward the humor in something.
name: Steve Zahn

quote: If it gets laughs, it's funny.
name: Rachel Dratch

quote: With song titles, I try to keep a healthy sense of humor while saying something at the same time.
name: Arca

quote: Colombian humor is very black, very sarcastic.
name: Barbet Schroeder

quote: David Ayer is known for being a very serious filmmaker, but he has a very great sense of humor.
name: Adewale Akinnuoye-Agbaje

quote: I've learned to have a sense of humor about myself. Lord knows everyone else does!
name: Debbie Gibson

quote: Russian humor is to adapt or make some sense or nonsense out of the insanity of their lives.
name: Ian Frazier

quote: People in Russia adapt to misery by a deep, deep humor.
name: Ian Frazier

quote: I want everything I do to have humor in it, because it seems to me that all of life has that.
name: Lawrence Kasdan

quote: If you can understand the humor in the drawing part you'll probably get the humor in the audio part.
name: Eric San

quote: The key to gallows humor is to make the joke, no matter how certain the gallows is.
name: James Adomian

quote: I don't have a very quick sense of humor.
name: Florenz Ziegfeld

quote: One has to develop a sense of humor to cope.
name: Diane English

quote: People in real life don't get ballplayers' humor, the way we talk in the clubhouse.
name: Justin Verlander

quote: With any character I play, I gravitate to the juxtaposition and humor.
name: Shawnee Smith

quote: The sense of humor has other things to do than to make itself conspicuous in the act of laughter.
name: Alice Meynell

quote: Humor is merely tragedy standing on its head with its pants torn.
name: Irvin S. Cobb

quote: The president of General Motors was in a foul humor.
name: Arthur Hailey

quote: I can't live without a sense of humor. I need to be laughing and entertained at all times.
name: Carlos Ponce

quote: One doesn't have a sense of humor. It has you.
name: Larry Gelbart

quote: If you could choose one characteristic that would get you through life, choose a sense of humor.
name: Jennifer Jones
